item.title: Jogulamba Gadwal Police Solve Kidnapping Case in Record 8 Hours, Victim Reunited with Family
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: District SP T. Srinivasa Rao, IPS, stated that it is highly commendable when citizens acknowledge and appreciate the prompt services provided by the police during times of distress.
In connection with the swift resolution of a kidnapping case within just 8 hours, the family and acquaintances of the victim, Ramesh, a Kirana shop owner from Shantinagar town, met with the District SP on Wednesday to convey their gratitude. During this interaction, the SP inquired about the sequence of even...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
